text: The Golden Path is a point-and-click adventure video game published in 1986 by Firebird Software. The game's player character is Y'n Hsi, a Chinese Bhikkhu (Buddhist monk) and nobleman. Y'n Hsi seeks to depose Ch'un Kuei, a tyrannical warlord who murdered Y'n Hsi's father. ==External links== * The Golden Path at Lemon Amiga * The Golden Path at Atari Mania Category:1986 video games Category:Amiga games Category:Atari ST games Category:Point-and-click adventure games Category:Video games developed in the United States
